<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7d3664df9008bd5f39f8a2555843d1b269946e4d|patch 8.2.0718: gcc warning for returning pointer to local variable>
patch 8.2.0718: gcc warning for returning pointer to local variable

Problem:    Gcc warning for returning pointer to local variable. (John
            Marriott)
Solution:   Return another pointer.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0718: gcc warning for returning pointer to local variable · vim/vim@7d3664d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0718: gcc warning for returning pointer to local variable · vim/vim@7d3664d
attachments.text: Problem: Gcc warning for returning pointer to local variable. (John Marriott) Solution: Return another pointer.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a5565e4189b7c4d3f03d1f5405fc64d5dc00f717|patch 8.2.0719: Vim9: more expressions can be evaluated at compile time>
patch 8.2.0719: Vim9: more expressions can be evaluated at compile time

Problem:    Vim9: more expressions can be evaluated at compile time
Solution:   Recognize has('name').

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0719: Vim9: more expressions can be evaluated at compile time · vim/vim@a5565e4
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0719: Vim9: more expressions can be evaluated at compile time · vim/vim@a5565e4
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: more expressions can be evaluated at compile time Solution: Recognize has('name').

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/b1062eb23e7a7a8b44f3416e79c3b28aa6c6c229|patch 8.2.0720: occasional exit when encountering an X error>
patch 8.2.0720: occasional exit when encountering an X error

Problem:    Occasional exit when encountering an X error. (Manfred Lotz)
Solution:   On an X error do not exit, do preserve files.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0720: occasional exit when encountering an X error · vim/vim@b1062eb
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0720: occasional exit when encountering an X error · vim/vim@b1062eb
attachments.text: Problem: Occasional exit when encountering an X error. (Manfred Lotz) Solution: On an X error do not exit, do preserve files.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/497f76bfbf9d5fe951221573d23696bb9e512c0b|patch 8.2.0721: Vim9: leaking memory when skipping>
patch 8.2.0721: Vim9: leaking memory when skipping

Problem:    Vim9: leaking memory when skipping.
Solution:   Disable skipping in generate_ppconst().

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0721: Vim9: leaking memory when skipping · vim/vim@497f76b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0721: Vim9: leaking memory when skipping · vim/vim@497f76b
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: leaking memory when skipping. Solution: Disable skipping in generate_ppconst().

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7d131b071539e73e4f8a1e6ffbb4d7bfc69a57ec|patch 8.2.0717: Vim9: postponed constant expressions does not scale>
patch 8.2.0717: Vim9: postponed constant expressions does not scale

Problem:    Vim9: postponed constant expressions does not scale.
Solution:   Add a structure to pass around postponed constants.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0717: Vim9: postponed constant expressions does not scale · vim/vim@7d131b0
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0717: Vim9: postponed constant expressions does not scale · vim/vim@7d131b0
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: postponed constant expressions does not scale. Solution: Add a structure to pass around postponed constants.
